name: @cesarchamal/single-spa-vue-app
description: Vue application with two example pages for be included in a single-spa application as registered app.

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vue-cli-service build --target lib --formats umd src/singleSpaEntry.js
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vue-cli-service build --target lib --formats umd src/singleSpaEntry.js --mode development
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vue-cli-service build --target lib --formats umd src/singleSpaEntry.js --mode production
scripts.serve: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 4205 --cors

author: Cesar Francisco Chavez Maldonado
